original_text: Then Jacob was greatly afraid and distressed. He divided the people who were with him, and the flocks and herds and camels, into two camps,
korean_text: 야곱이 심히 두렵고 답답하여 자기와 함께 한 동행자와 양과 소와 낙타를 두 떼로 나누고

sentences.original_text: Then Jacob was greatly afraid and distressed.
He divided the people who were with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기와 함께 있는 사람들을 나누었고,

sentences.original_text: and the flocks and herds and camels,
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼와 소 떼와 낙타들도 나누었고,
